𐀭-𐀞-𐀝-𐀺-𐀕-𐀜 sa-pa-nu-wo-me-no •separated

break, fract, fork

• Arabic فلق (flq) [to split] with Sanskrit परशु (paraśu) [Axe], probably related to PIIr paraću. Also, πέλεκυς (pélekys) [Axe] but it is probably from Pre-Greek βέλεκκος [Pulse] influenced by the semitic pronounciation.

𓐍 𓃀 𓏴 | destroy | … 𓃀 𓏴 √break / √part ?

𓂧 𓂋 𓀜 | destroy | ⇔ 𓐍 𓃀 •chopr ⇔ ثبر t̠br ?
𓂧 𓂋 𓀜 | destroy | ⇔ ثبر t̠br ܬܒܪ (t̠bar) [to break, to fract] तपर tapara Persian tᵅpᵅrᵅ տապար tapar ⇔ topòrъ
𓂧 𓂋 𓀜 | destroy | ⋍destroy Troy⇔Treiben! <<<
𓂧 𓂋 𓀜 | drive away | drive ++
